description: This file declares external APIs and data structures for the CCSP Alias Manager component, including initialization, cleanup, and name retrieval functions.

methods.name: CcspAliasMgrInitialize
methods.description: Initializes the CCSP Alias Manager and returns a handle.

methods.name: CcspAliasMgrFree
methods.description: Frees resources associated with the alias manager handle.

methods.name: CcspAliasMgrLoadAliasInfo
methods.description: Loads alias information from an XML DOM node.

methods.name: CcspAliasMgrGetInternalNames
methods.description: Retrieves internal names associated with a parameter.

methods.name: CcspAliasMgrGetNextName
methods.description: Returns the next name in the list.

methods.name: CcspAliasMgrGetFirstInternalName
methods.description: Retrieves the first internal name for a parameter.

methods.name: CcspAliasMgrGetExternalName
methods.description: Retrieves external name associated with a parameter.
